name: 消消乐 - 经典消除游戏全新升级版
name_original: 消消乐 - 经典消除游戏全新升级版
description:
Once started, it is difficult to put down.

IPhone download the most casual puzzle games, millions of people every day crazy point. Is it necessary to innovate now?

The world's first to join two different games are played, so that everyone can get unlimited fun. Original two different modes of operation, rough and fast and technical players can be handy.

Rules are super simple, find and eliminate more than two of the same color of the box, the more the box, the higher the score.

Various games are played:
Classic mode - no time limit, to meet each target score clearance
Time limit of 60 seconds - the more time to score, the more reward

A variety of props, reasonable use will make you more with less.

Play more, won the infinite gold coins, so that your dream come true. Share your results to microblogging, micro letter. Challenge your friends on Game Center.
